scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:browser && bun run clean:server
scripts.build: bun run clean:all && bun run build:browser --minify --sourcemap=external && bun run build:server
scripts.dev:start: while [ ! -f ./build/server/index.js ]; do sleep 0.5; done && bun run --watch ./build/server/index.js
scripts.dev: bun run clean:all && (bun run dev:browser & pid_browser=$; bun run dev:server & pid_server=$; bun run dev:start & pid_start=$; wait; kill $pid_browser $pid_server $pid_start)
